title: disconnecting from pvp.net and client
body:
Been getting this on and off the last few weeks, client says i have no internet connection. Causing a lot of in game dc with many game losses, due to this I'm on my 2nd time low priority ques from being afk too long. 
Currently uninstalling and will reinstall the entire game, but is there any possible reason for this happening? I have checked at times what is using my internet at the time sometimes the patch seems to be auto updating during game play, other than that i have nothing else consuming my internet. 
I been playing this since NA season 1, never have i had this much issues then i have in the last few weeks. 
Any insight or help would be appreciated, as is very frustrating.

I have been getting this error a lot... but mine is happening during the Champion Select. This causes the selection part to freeze for me which makes me unable to choose a champion. If i already locked in before the message and the game would have went to the load screen, i can close out of the window and restart league and join in on the game... no idea why it is doing that.

Reinstalling may not necessarily solve this if the issue is network related.  I suggest starting with the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot anything blocking your connection from holding tight to the game servers.  Test it out in custom games, and let me know how it goes!
